from wordcloud import WordCloud, STOPWORDS
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 8))
total_string = ' '.join(meta_info['tag'] )
wordcloud = WordCloud(width = 3000, height = 2000, random_state=1, 
                      background_color='white', colormap='Set2', collocations=False, 
                      stopwords = STOPWORDS).generate(total_string)
ax.imshow(wordcloud) 
ax.axis('off')
plt.show()

fig, ax = plt.subplots(1, 1, figsize=(25, 8))
ax.bar(problems.index, problems, color=['#d4dddd' if i%2==0 else '#fafafa' for i in range(9)],
       width=0.55, 
       edgecolor='black', 
       linewidth=0.7)

ax.margins(0.02, 0.05)
ax.set_ylim(0, 1100)
for i in range(20):
    ax.annotate(f'{problems[i]}', xy=(i, problems[i]+20),
                   va='center', ha='center',
               )

ax.set_title('# of Keywords', weight='bold', fontsize=15)
ax.grid(axis='y', linestyle='-', alpha=0.4)

fig.tight_layout()
plt.show()
